answers.answer: I took mine a few weeks ago but my midwife said that I could eat just no sweets! Are you taking the 1 hour or 3 hour glucose test?

when they ask you to fast it is to help you. drinking pop and earing junk food will definitely not help because it has a lot of sugar and that is one thing you want to avoid since they give you the high in sugar glucose drink that usually contains 50ml. you may have to re-test.
I had to fast for the test...12 hours.You could pass...or you might not. Just depends on your body. I fasted and i still failed but passed my 3 hour test.
My doctor said I didn't have to fast I ate fruity pebbles like an hour before my test and I still passed lol
My doctor told me I could eat and drink just no super sweet foods but with my daughter all I ate was sweets and I snuck some the night before my test and I still passed you should be fine
I would say maybe not drink the pop lol
The soda might make you fail but if tou do fail they'll just make you  take the 3 hour test which if you do fail you'll be diagnosed as having gestational diabetes.

question: I have one at 8 in the morning.. I hope I pass cuss they told me not to eat 10 hours before but at 1030 I was eating cuss I was starving!! Now I'm just drinking some pop. I really hope I pass cuss I know I'm not suppose to eat or drink but I couldn't help it!Do you think I'll pass? I had a half sand which (salami & ham) some chips.. A serving of cottage cheese & like 1&1/2 plain bagels with cream cheese & 12oz of Pepsi)
title: Glucose Test.. what do you think??
